parameters.query:
INSERT INTO owner_marketing_summary (
  property_id, week_ending, applications, application_statuses
) VALUES (
  {{ $json.property_id }},
  DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY),
  {{ $json.application_count }},
  '{{ $json.application_statuses }}'
)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
  applications = VALUES(applications),
  application_statuses = VALUES(application_statuses),
  updated_at = NOW();
